wikipedia_page.main: Michael John Sutton (5 October 1944 – 26 December 2020) was an English professional footballer. He played in the Football League for three clubs. Two of his sons, Chris and John, have also played professionally.

response: Sutton was born in Nottingham, the son of Mike Sutton, formerly a footballer with Norwich City. His younger brother John also became a footballer, and has played for a number of clubs in both England and Scotland. As a child he moved from East Leake in Nottinghamshire to Horsford in Norfolk.
Sutton is the son of Mike Sutton and the brother of ex-Celtic striker Chris Sutton.
*Mike Sutton OBE, (born 1978) British Fighter pilot, author
Michael or Mike Sutton may refer to:
*Mike Sutton, of American musical duo Mike & Brenda Sutton
